question: For the reaction <katex>$2\text{N}_2\text{O}_{5(g)} \rightarrow 4\text{NO}_{2(g)} + \text{O}_{2(g)}$</katex> initial concentration of <katex>$\text{N}_2\text{O}_5$</katex> is <katex>$2.0 \text{mol L}^{-1}$</katex> and after 300 min, it is reduced to <katex>$1.4 \text{mol L}^{-1}$</katex>.
